when human history crosses a stream of Mana.
It can be said that it is the ingredient for materializing Heroic Spirits.

"Skill Up & Ascension Material"
The shell of a clam that has lived for an eternity.
When you put your ear against the aperture, you can hear the sounds of pure waves from the distant past.

have sealed in an elemental
with tremendous magical energy.

skills.name: King's Return A
skills.detail: Greatly increase all allies' C. Star Drop Rate (3 turns)

skills.name: Sovereign of Magical Staffs EX
skills.detail: Increase Arts Card effectiveness (3 turns) & Debuff Success Rate (3 turns) for all allies

extraPassive.name: Doujin A
extraPassive.detail: Increase Doujin Motivation & Doujin Technique & Doujin Imagination amount per drop by 30% & increase Bond gained when completing quests by 20% [Event Only]

extraPassive.name: Swordbeauty's Knowledge B

buffs.name: Swordbeauty's Knowledge
buffs.detail: Increase damage dealt in "All In! Las Vegas Championship Match - Seven Duels of Swordbeauties!"

noblePhantasms.name: Melammu Dingir
noblePhantasms.detail: Deal heavy damage to all enemies & decrease DEF (3 turns) <effect increases with Overcharge> for all enemies + increase DEF for all allies (3 turns)

501830.name: Establishment
501830.detail: He may be treating it like it's no big deal, but it's all expensive, designer stuff.

comments.comment:
The wisest king of all, made so after returning from his quest for immortality.
In the legends, he is spoken of as "the man who saw everything."
He is sometimes cold and sometimes accepting of human emotion. He is the stern, yet great king of Uruk.

Height/Weight: 182cm, 68kg
Origin: Sumerian Civilization, Epic of Gilgamesh
Region: Babylonia, Uruk
Alignment: Lawful-Good
Gender: Male
In this manifestation, he is not a tyrant, but a mature king, as he was after his return from the underworld.

Item Construction (Fake): A
The ability to create magical tools.
Gilgamesh isn't normally a mage, so it would not be possible for him to have this ability, but the existence of his Noble Phantasm gives him a similar power. The tools he creates (summoned from his Noble Phantasm) are all things from the treasury of Babylon.

Charisma: A+
Gilgamesh was the greatest of kings, and this is his charisma as a truly wise king.
He has extremely high charisma, similar to magical energy, or a curse.

Sovereign of Magical Staffs: EX
This skill represents Gilgamesh's status as the bearer of multiple Mystic Codes.
It gives his magical attacks a bonus.
He was a king who could, if he was careful when he fought, be gentle with his tools.

Territory Creation: A
As a mage, not only can he make tools, but he can even create buildings.
The fortresses of Uruk were actually designed by Gilgamesh.
Since there's a limit to what you can do with clay and stone, he mutters to himself, "I want more wood. I need to visit the Cedar Forest..."
But after what happened with Enkidu, the King doesn't really want to go there.

『Melammu Dingir』
Rank: B 
Type: Anti-Army - Anti-Fortress 
Signal Cannon of the King.
A long-range bombing from the Uruk fortress. This amazing artillery strike uses not only the power of Gilgamesh, but of all the citizens of Uruk who lived during the Age of Gods.

Gilgamesh (reluctantly) loads his collection onto the catapult and allows his soldiers to fire them.
"Broken Phantasm?
I did that over 4,000 years ago!"

comments.condMessage: Unlock after clearing Seventh Singularity and reach Bond Level 5
comments.comment:
Humanity's oldest King of Heroes, Gilgamesh himself.
His nature is different than when he is an Archer.
He is not a hero manifesting in a storm of power, but a wise king who leads his people.

"Fwahaha! It should be obvious if you look at my alignment!
I can overcome most any suffering and trials, but I refuse to die of overwork again!"

Since he's watching his back much more than he was in the form of the King of Heroes, he has become more meticulous in battle.

voiceLines.name: Birthday
voiceLines.subtitle:
It's your birthday? Hmph, that doesn't matter.
Wait, I believe I had a suitable curse Noble Phantasm somewhere.

voiceLines.name: During an Event
voiceLines.subtitle:
Be on your way to the festival, mongrel.
Or would you rather be exterminated by my staff?

voiceLines.name: Conversation 1
voiceLines.subtitle:
You're one hundred years early to be resting.
Don't bore me, mongrel.

voiceLines.name: Conversation 2
voiceLines.subtitle:
Struggle with all your might, mongrel. 
You're lucky to have summoned me like this, so it is on you to make the most of it.

voiceLines.name: Conversation 3
voiceLines.subtitle: You're my attendant, aren't you? Start serving me like one.

voiceLines.name: Likes
voiceLines.subtitle:
All the treasures of this world belong to me. 
That is why I could be summoned as a Caster.

voiceLines.name: Dislikes
voiceLines.subtitle:
What I can't stand?
The ones who caused this whole mess in the first place, I suppose. 
That is why I am here, in this form.

voiceLines.name: About the Holy Grail
voiceLines.subtitle:
The Holy Grail is also my possession.
Any mongrels who try to put their hands on it will receive the appropriate punishment.

voiceLines.name: Bond Level 1
voiceLines.subtitle:
What's that? "King Gilgamesh, were you a mage during your lifetime?"
Ha ha ha! How foolish! As if I would stoop that low!

voiceLines.name: Bond Level 2
voiceLines.subtitle:
I told you when you summoned me, mongrel. 
I came of my own accord, in this form, in this class.

voiceLines.name: Bond Level 3
voiceLines.subtitle:
All the spells I cast comes from the innumerable magical staffs in my treasury.
With my wealth of power, I could even control Mystics from the Age of the Gods... Of course, I'm not really accustomed to it.

voiceLines.name: Bond Level 4
voiceLines.subtitle:
It looks like I'm having trouble fighting, you say? You've got quite the mouth, mongrel, but I'll forgive it.
This is all on purpose. Do you know why?

voiceLines.name: Bond Level 5
voiceLines.subtitle:
Why do I pretend to be a mage? I'll tell you why. 
It's a deliberate provocation. You could say I'm sneering at someone. 
But this form does keeps me amused as well.

voiceLines.name: Bond Level 5
voiceLines.subtitle:
Why do I pretend to be a mage? I'll tell you why. 
It's a deliberate provocation. You could say I'm sneering at someone.
...At that Grand Caster, of course!
These eyes see right through him!

voiceLines.name: Conversation 5
voiceLines.subtitle:
Oh-ho. This Ishtar looks a little smarter. 
Without her father to cling too, she's become a self-reliant goddess... Hmph.
The will of a girl who lost her father early was able to fix that useless goddess.
Fate is certainly well woven.

voiceLines.name: Conversation 6
voiceLines.subtitle:
I have nothing to say to Enkidu as I am now.
With their death, I become the ruler of Uruk... The "King of Men."
I lost the freedom to speak with them the moment I took the throne.

voiceLines.name: Level up
voiceLines.subtitle: [id 501800_0_G010]Good, good. Make your offerings to me as you would to the heavens.

voiceLines.name: Ascension 2
voiceLines.subtitle:
[id 501800_0_G020]Well, let's see where this goes...
[id 501800_0_G021]No, I'm not asking your opinion. Just pay close attention.

voiceLines.name: Ascension 1
voiceLines.subtitle:
[id 501800_0_G030]It's easier to move now.
[id 501800_0_G031]What are you looking at? [delay 2.9]So entranced by the sight of the king's body that you lost your very soul?

voiceLines.name: Ascension 3
voiceLines.subtitle:
[id 501800_0_G040]I see, this is my form when materialized as a Caster.
[id 501800_0_G041]Ha ha ha!

voiceLines.name: Ascension 4
voiceLines.subtitle:
[id 501800_0_G050]I shall revise my opinion of you, mongrel. 
[id 501800_0_G051]Let me show you something special.

voiceLines.name: Summon
text:
[r]
I have materialized in this form to meet Uruk's time of need,
not in response to your summon.
voiceLines.subtitle:
Caster, Gilgamesh.
I have materialized in this form to meet Uruk's time of need, not in response to your summon.
Don’t get cocky, mongrel.

voiceLines.name: Attack 1
voiceLines.subtitle: Heh!

voiceLines.name: Attack 2
voiceLines.subtitle: What's wrong!? Show me something!

voiceLines.name: Attack 3
voiceLines.subtitle: Fire, fire, fire, fire!

voiceLines.name: Extra Attack
voiceLines.subtitle: Rejoice, mongrel. Now, begone!

voiceLines.name: Skill 1
voiceLines.subtitle: Magecraft only... The ability to show self-restraint is also the mark of a true king.

voiceLines.name: Skill 2
voiceLines.subtitle: On to the next task...

voiceLines.name: Battle Start 1
voiceLines.subtitle: I'm busy. Don't take too much of my time.

voiceLines.name: Battle Start 2
voiceLines.subtitle: Come, lowlife. Who knows, you might even win.

voiceLines.name: Victory 1
voiceLines.subtitle: The more strategies at your disposal, the better. You've learned that, at the cost of your life.

voiceLines.name: Victory 2
voiceLines.subtitle: I'm just playing at being a mage, but it's not going too badly.

voiceLines.name: Damage 2
voiceLines.subtitle: Ngh!

voiceLines.name: Damage 1
voiceLines.subtitle: You little...!

voiceLines.name: Incapacitated 1
voiceLines.subtitle: I grow weary of this. I'm leaving.

voiceLines.name: Incapacitated 2
voiceLines.subtitle: As I thought, I shouldn't play at being a mage...

voiceLines.name: Command Card 1
voiceLines.subtitle: All right. Let's use that.

voiceLines.name: Command Card 2
voiceLines.subtitle: Hmm... There was that, too.

voiceLines.name: Command Card 3
voiceLines.subtitle: I suppose it doesn't matter which.

voiceLines.name: Noble Phantasm Card
voiceLines.subtitle: Heed my voice! Ready the ballistas!

voiceLines.name: Noble Phantasm
voiceLines.subtitle:
[id 501800_0_B050]By my order, ready the arrows! 
[id 501800_0_B051]Use my treasures to show them the power that protects Uruk! 
[id 501800_0_B052]My resolve shall flood the earth!
[id 501800_0_B053]Melammu Dingir!

voiceLines.name: About Spiritron Dress
voiceLines.subtitle: Are you wondering whether wearing a suit in the tropics is appropriate? Me being in a swimsuit is hardly valuable by now. More importantly, what excites me now is venture capital. Hmm... I have an urge to build a great amusement park here...

voiceLines.name: Unlock Wardrobe
voiceLines.subtitle:
[id 501800_11_G060]Since the opportunity presented itself, I might as well try my hand at business for a while. 
[id 501800_11_G061]Heh. Spare me the bewildered look. 
[id 501800_11_G062]I have no intention of acting like a king at a resort. 
[id 501800_11_G063]As this is a vacation, I will loosen up a bit and enjoy myself! 
[id 501800_11_G064]You should change into a swimsuit as well!

voiceLines.name: Level up
voiceLines.subtitle: [id 501800_11_G010]Good, good. Make your offerings to me as you would to the heavens.

voiceLines.name: Battle Start 1
voiceLines.subtitle: A vacation, huh? Work hard, play hard!

voiceLines.name: Battle Start 2
voiceLines.subtitle: Why are you surprised? One should go all out when one plays!

voiceLines.name: Skill 1
voiceLines.subtitle: This is what it means to have it all.

voiceLines.name: Skill 2
voiceLines.subtitle: Give me a break. Today's my day off.

voiceLines.name: Command Card 1
voiceLines.subtitle: Should I order us a bottle?

voiceLines.name: Command Card 2
voiceLines.subtitle: Don't take your eyes off me.

voiceLines.name: Command Card 3
voiceLines.subtitle: Waiter! Prepare me a champagne tower!

voiceLines.name: Noble Phantasm Card
voiceLines.subtitle: No matter the setting, a king's commands must be obeyed! Never forget that!

voiceLines.name: Attack 1
voiceLines.subtitle: Let me show you!

voiceLines.name: Attack 2
voiceLines.subtitle: Still not enough!

voiceLines.name: Attack 3
voiceLines.subtitle: Fuhaha, hahahahahaha!

voiceLines.name: Extra Attack
voiceLines.subtitle: It's a festival. Let's go out big...!

voiceLines.name: Damage 1
voiceLines.subtitle: Why you...I told you it's my day off!!!

voiceLines.name: Damage 2
voiceLines.subtitle: It's my day off!

voiceLines.name: Incapacitated 1
voiceLines.subtitle: I forgot...to check the morning stock prices...

voiceLines.name: Incapacitated 2
voiceLines.subtitle: Seems I got too excited...but I'm not going to dwell on my actions!

voiceLines.name: Victory 1
voiceLines.subtitle: Out of consideration for this beautiful tropical setting, I will forgive you. Be grateful to Hawaii.

voiceLines.name: Victory 2
voiceLines.subtitle: Maybe I'll build a resort hotel next...
